name: Alien Girl
overview: Aliana, first human and xenoform hybrid coming from the planet Atlas, takes her spaceship to start a personal fight with the only help of her navigation system aLMa to rise as the only queen and achieve the races balance. She must carry out 3 purges, the first one, in the human investigation center were all humans have been killed. The second purge will be carried out in Aqueronte planet in the Alien colony while the third and the last purge will take place in the Decoud spaceship; a human spaceship for Aliens transportation. Will Aliana finally rise as the queen?
